title: Direct deposit
description: Follow this pattern to collect banking information for Veterans to receive electronic payments.

frontMatter.title: Direct deposit
frontMatter.description: Follow this pattern to collect banking information for Veterans to receive electronic payments.
frontMatter.intro: Use this pattern when collecting banking information so Veterans can receive electronic payments through direct deposit.

when_to_use.value: **Collecting banking details.** When Veterans need to receive electronic payments for benefits.
**Reviewing or updating accounts.** When Veterans need to modify previously entered bank account details.

design_principles.value: **Include a check image.** Provide a visual reference guide showing where to find account and routing numbers.
**Show masked data for review.** Display only the last 4 digits of account numbers when showing existing information.
**Clarify scope of changes.** Some benefits are affected by updates while others maintain separate account information.
**Offer alternatives.** Include expandable section addressing 'What if I don't have a bank account?'

examples.title: New direct deposit information
examples.description: Form for collecting banking information with check image reference guide.

examples.title: Review existing information
examples.description: Card displaying masked account data with edit button to make changes.

how_to_build.intro: The direct deposit pattern collects and displays banking information securely.

steps.value: Fieldset legend: 'Direct Deposit' with explanatory text about requirements.
Include a check image showing where to locate account and routing numbers.
Account type: Radio button group for Checking or Savings options.
Bank routing number: Required 9-digit text input.
Bank account number: Required text input.
Additional info component for common questions.
For review: Display bank name, masked account number (last 4 digits), and edit button.

frontMatter.code_usage:
The direct deposit pattern is implemented in various VA.gov forms.

**Production examples:**
- VA Form 22-10203 (Rogers STEM Scholarship application)
- VA.gov Profile direct deposit section

See the [vets-website repository](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/vets-website) for implementation details.

content_specs.error_message: Enter a valid nine digit routing number

accessibility.value: Ensure form fields have visible, associated labels.
The check image should have descriptive alt text explaining how to find routing and account numbers.
Error messages should be associated with fields using aria-describedby.
Masked account numbers should be announced properly to screen readers.
